ActivityLong: C6_Stay at home requirements_ no measures
C7_Restrictions on internal movement_ no measures

E1_Income support`
(for households)_ no income support

E2_Debt/contract relief`
(for households)_ no debt/contract relief
C2_Workplace closing_ recommend closing (or recommend work from home)
C4_Restrictions on gatherings_ restrictions on very large gatherings (the limit is above 1000 people)
C5_Close public transport_ recommend closing (or significantly reduce volume/route/means of transport available)
C6_Stay at home requirements_ recommend not leaving house
C7_Restrictions on internal movement_ recommend not to travel between regions/cities

E1_Income support`
(for households)_ government is replacing less than 50% of lost salary (or if a flat sum, it is less than 50% median salary)
E1_Flag_ transfers to informal sector workers too

E2_Debt/contract relief`
(for households)_ narrow relief, specific to one kind of contract
E3_Fiscal measures_ no new spending that day
E4_International support_ no new spending that day
H1_Public information campaigns_ public officials urging caution about Covid
H2_Testing policy_ only those who both (a) have symptoms AND (b) meet specific criteria (eg key workers, admitted to hospital, came into contact with a known case, returned from overseas)
Activity: Test with Symptoms or Known Case Links
ActivityShort: Test with Symptoms or Known Case Links

ActivityLong: H3_Contact tracing_ limited contact tracing; not done for all cases
H4_Emergency investment in healthcare_ no new spending that day
H5_Investment in vaccines_ no new spending that day
C1_School closing_ require closing (only some levels or categories, eg just high school, or just public schools)
C2_Workplace closing_ require closing (or work from home) for some sectors or categories of workers
C4_Restrictions on gatherings_ restrictions on gatherings between 101
C5_Close public transport_ require closing (or prohibit most citizens from using it)
C6_Stay at home requirements_ require not leaving house with exceptions for daily exercise, grocery shopping, and 'essential' trips
C7_Restrictions on internal movement_ internal movement restrictions in place
C8_International travel controls_ quarantine arrivals from some or all regions

E1_Income support`
(for households)_ government is replacing 50% or more of lost salary (or if a flat sum, it is greater than 50% median salary)

E2_Debt/contract relief`
(for households)_ broad debt/contract relief
H1_Public information campaigns_ coordinated public information campaign (eg across traditional and social media)
H2_Testing policy_ testing of anyone showing Covid
H3_Contact tracing_ comprehensive contact tracing; done for all identified cases
H4_Emergency investment in healthcare_ no data
C1_School closing_ require closing all levels
C2_Workplace closing_ require closing (or work from home) for all
C4_Restrictions on gatherings_ restrictions on gatherings between 11
C6_Stay at home requirements_ require not leaving house with minimal exceptions (eg allowed to leave once a week, or only one person can leave at a time, etc)
C7_Restrictions on internal movement_ no data
C8_International travel controls_ ban arrivals from some regions
H2_Testing policy_ open public testing (eg "drive through" testing available to asymptomatic people)
